# UIGraphicsRendererContext

**Class**

The base class for the drawing environments for graphics renderers.

## Declaration

```swift
class UIGraphicsRendererContext
```

## Overview

You don’t create instances of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIGraphicsRendererContext] yourself. Instead, when you use a concrete subclass of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIGraphicsRenderer], you are provided an instance of the appropriate [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIGraphicsRendererContext] subclass—either [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIGraphicsImageRendererContext] or [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIGraphicsPDFRendererContext]—as an argument to a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIGraphicsDrawingActions] drawing actions block.

[doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIGraphicsRendererContext] objects provide high-level drawing methods in addition to access to the underlying Core Graphics context.

## Getting the drawing context

- **cgContext**: The underlying Core Graphics context.
- **format**: The format used to create the associated graphics renderer.

## Drawing content

- **stroke(_:)**: Paints a rectangular path using the currently selected stroke color.
- **stroke(_:blendMode:)**: Paints a rectangular path using the currently selected stroke color and specified blend mode.
- **fill(_:blendMode:)**: Paints a rectangular area with the currently selected fill color using the supplied blend mode.
- **fill(_:)**: Paints a rectangular area with the currently selected fill color.

## Applying a clipping rectangle

- **clip(to:)**: Sets the clipping mask for the drawing context to the specified rectangle.

## Graphics contexts

- **UIGraphicsRenderer**: An abstract base class for creating graphics renderers.
- **UIGraphicsRendererFormat**: A set of drawing attributes that represents the configuration of a graphics renderer context.
- **UIGraphicsImageRenderer**: A graphics renderer for creating Core Graphics-backed images.
- **UIGraphicsImageRendererContext**: The drawing environment for an image renderer.
- **UIGraphicsImageRendererFormat**: A set of drawing attributes that represents the configuration of an image renderer context.
- **UIGraphicsPDFRenderer**: A graphics renderer for creating PDFs.
- **UIGraphicsPDFRendererContext**: The drawing environment for a PDF renderer.
- **UIGraphicsPDFRendererFormat**: A set of drawing attributes that represents the configuration of a PDF renderer context.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Inherited By

- UIGraphicsImageRendererContext
- UIGraphicsPDFRendererContext

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
